plot: A man is haunted by a stupid decision he made in the past and despite his regret he is unable to change his habits.
title: Hurt
plot_es: A man is haunted by a stupid decision he made in the past and despite his regret he is unable to change his habits.
plot_en: A man is haunted by a stupid decision he made in the past and despite his regret he is unable to change his habits.
